name: 坦克英雄 TankHero
description:
Welcome to [TankHero]!


The gameplay in TankHero is simple, as players control a tank to overcome various obstacles and eliminate enemy tanks along the way. Successfully reaching the endpoint marks victory. Players can earn stars by destroying tanks and winning maps, which can be used to unlock higher-level tanks and enhance their attributes, such as damage and health, enabling their tank hero to fight more valiantly.

TankHero features 11 different tanks and multiple maps for players to choose from, including BT-7, T34-76, Cromwell, Panzer-IV, Firefly, KV-I, T-34-85, T-35, Tiger-I, BT-42, and KV-II. Choosing the right tank is crucial for adapting to different map challenges. The game also offers vast map areas for players to explore beyond completing missions.

In TankHero, the armor values of different positions on each tank vary. Attacking the right position can instantly take down an enemy tank. Experience the thrill of aiming and firing in one swift motion and taking down your opponent in an instant in TankHero!
